description: Personally used Honda Vezel, X Grade manufactured in Aug. 2014 and registered in Nov. 2014, CAB – 6xxx series (bought brand new). Black exterior and interior. Maintained by the Honda Agents (Stafford Motors) with records available. Used 95 Octane petrol only.  First owner and done about 62,000 km GENUINE mileage. Original chrome shell with customised coil matts and sunvisors (costing more than Rs. 60,000). Amaron maintenance free battery with two years’ warranty. All other options including Emergency braking, Traction control, Auto brake hold, Auto AC, push start, power steering/shutters/retractable mirrors, ABS, etc. Selling due to upgrade. Genuine buyers only. Price is negotiable.
name: Honda Vezel  2014
